description: This table contains information associated with each image that is attached to an order and displayed in the Findings activity.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: FNDMETA_DOC_INFO_ID
columns.description: The unique DCS ID for findings images metadata for an order.

columns.name: SELECTED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the image is selected by the user for this order. 'Y' indicates that the image is selected by the user for this order. 'N' or NULL indicates that the image is not selected by the user for this order.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: GENRTD_CAPT
columns.description: The auto-generated caption for the image from the Findings activity.

columns.name: FREETEXT_CAPT
columns.description: The free-text caption entered by end users for the image from the Findings activity.

columns.name: BODY_LOC_RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the image body location chosen by end users from the Findings activity for the order.

columns.name: IMG_DISP_LABEL
columns.description: The unique, auto-generated label ID in the form of a capital letter, which is added in ascending order (A, B, C, etc.).
